fields.original_string: private final SimpleSuggestionEngine suggestionEngine = new SimpleSuggestionEngine();

private static final Comparator<Suggestion> SUGGESTION_COMPARATOR =
            (s1, s2) -> Integer.compare(s2.getScore(), s1.getScore());

@Autowired(required = false)
    private List<SuggestionEngineRule> rules = new ArrayList<>();

methods.full_signature: @Override public Stream<Suggestion> score(Stream<ActionDefinition> actions, ColumnMetadata column)
@Override public Suggestion score(ActionDefinition actionDef, ColumnMetadata column)

focal_method.full_signature: @Override public Stream<Suggestion> score(Stream<ActionDefinition> actions, ColumnMetadata column)
